name: SQL Server First Responder Kit
tagline: sp_Blitz, sp_BlitzCache, sp_BlitzIndex, and other SQL Server scripts for health checks and performance tuning.
body:
### What Are These Scripts?

* sp_Blitz - prioritized SQL Server health check to make sure your databases are backed up, you don't have corruption, and there's no ugly surprises in your server. [Documentation](https://www.brentozar.com/blitz/)
* sp_BlitzCache - lists the most resource-intensive queries in your plan cache. [Documentation](https://www.brentozar.com/blitzcache/)
* sp_BlitzIndex - checks a database's indexes for duplicates, heaps, missing indexes, and more. [Documentation](https://www.brentozar.com/blitzindex/)
* sp_AskBrent - performance health check of what's broken on the server right now. [Documentation](https://www.brentozar.com/askbrent/)

[Download the latest release from Github.](https://github.com/BrentOzarULTD/SQL-Server-First-Responder-Kit/releases/latest)

### Project Status

2016-06-11 - We're migrating our tools from a private Github repo to a public one. We're in the midst of building out pages on:

* How to use the tools
* How to file issues
* How to contribute code

### Support or Contact

* For issues with the scripts, [open a Github issue.](https://github.com/BrentOzarULTD/SQL-Server-First-Responder-Kit/issues)
* For questions about contributing code or licensing, [contact us.](https://www.brentozar.com/contact/)
